entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Dolbeau-Mistassini
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:55 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -21.2°C

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clearing. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Clearing early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the evening. Amount 10 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the evening. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
